biography: Tomas, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, hails from Espoo Ringside Golf. Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Tomas has always been a formidable competitor. Off the course, he is a keen strategist, often seen analyzing playbooks and devising new techniques.

With three past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Tomas has shown dedication to the event. While he is considered retired from Hector events and not expected to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, his contributions to the tournament are notable, and he is a respected figure among his peers.

Although Tomas has not yet claimed either the Hector Trophée or the Victor Trophy, his consistent performance and unwavering spirit have left a lasting impression on the tournament. Spectators and fellow golfers alike appreciate his sportsmanship and commitment to the game.
